document_data.name: Lorien Dawnbringer
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lorien Dawnbringer''' was a [[cleric|priestess]] of [[Sune]] in [[Waterdeep]].  She was a very good friend of [[Ilira Nathalan]] and the two were rumored to be lovers although it's doubtful they had a physical relationship because Ilira's [[spellscar]] prevented her from touching another person.  Lorien spent time skulking around [[Downshadow]], healing adventurers who had taken on more than they could handle.

In [[1479 DR]] in an attempt to gain a measure of revenge on Ilira, [[Beshaba|Beshaba's]] high [[priest]], [[Lilten]], had Lorien killed by one of his minions, the [[dwarf]] [[Rath]].
